extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Cisco Product and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is running an affected version of Cisco products such as Unified Communications Manager, Unified CM IM&P, Unified CM SME, Unified Contact Center Express, Unity Connection, or Virtualized Voice Browser.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running an affected version?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected Cisco product to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

affected_products: Unified Communications Manager IM & Presence Service (Unified CM IM&P): 11.5(1), 12.5(1), 14
Unified Communications Manager Session Management Edition (Unified CM SME): 11.5, 12.5(1), 14
Unified Contact Center Express (UCCX): 12.0 and earlier, 12.5(1)
